meanings.definition: A small rug placed in front of a fireplace for decorative or protective purposes.
meanings.sent1: The hearthrugs added a cozy touch to the living room.
meanings.sent2: During winter, people often gather around the hearthrugs to keep warm.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the hearthrugs for a comfy bed and curled up on it.
meanings.sent4: The hearthrugs were like a warm welcome mat for guests entering the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the hearthrugs made them a focal point of the room.

meanings.definition: To cover or decorate with a hearthrug.
meanings.sent1: She decided to hearthrug the area in front of the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: The hearthrugged floor looked much more inviting.
meanings.sent3: He hearthrugs his home with colorful rugs to brighten up the space.
meanings.sent4: The decorator hearthrugs the room with luxurious fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The hearthrugging process transformed the room into a cozy retreat.
